custom_params.label: OP1
custom_params.tooltip: First operator intensity - feeds into OP2

custom_params.label: OP2
custom_params.tooltip: Second operator - modulates OP3, scaled by OP1

custom_params.label: OP3
custom_params.tooltip: Third operator output - feeds back to OP1

custom_params.label: FBK
custom_params.tooltip: Feedback amount OP3 to OP1 - creates instability

custom_params.label: DRF
custom_params.tooltip: Drift in all operator frequency ratios
